com.devwebsphere.wxsutils
Class WXSUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.devwebsphere.wxsutils.WXSUtils

public class WXSUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This is a utility class. Each instance is associated with a thread pool and a specific client ObjectGrid connection. It provides accelerated method for bulk operations and interacting with agents in general. Normally, most applications using a single grid would create this and store an instance in a static variable and then use in their client.

getAll

public <K,V> java.util.Map<K,V> getAll(java.util.Collection<K> keys,
                                       com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.BackingMap bmap)
Get all the values for keys in parallel from a map

Type Parameters:
K - The key of the Map
V - The values of the Map
Parameters:
keys - The keys to fetch in parallel
bmap - The map from which to fetch the keys
Returns:
A Map of the key/value pairs

putAll

public <K,V> void putAll(java.util.Map<K,V> batch,
                         com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.BackingMap bmap)
This puts the K/V pairs in to the grid in parallel as efficiently as possible. Any existing values for any K are over written.

Type Parameters:
K - The key type to use
V - The value type to use
Parameters:
batch - The KV pairs to put in the grid
bmap - The map to store them in.

removeAll

public <K> void removeAll(java.util.List<K> batch,
                          com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.BackingMap bmap)
This removes the Keys from the grid in parallel as efficiently as possible. The entries will also be removed from any backend if a Loader is used. This isn't an invalidate, it's a remove operation.

Type Parameters:
K - The key type to use
Parameters:
batch - The keys to remove from the grid
bmap - The map to store them in.

callMapAgentAll

public <K,A extends com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.datagrid.MapGridAgent,X> java.util.Map<K,X> callMapAgentAll(java.util.Map<K,A> batch,
                                                                                                             com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.BackingMap bmap)
This takes a Map of key/MapAgent pairs and then invokes the agent for each key as efficiently as possible

Type Parameters:
K - The type of the keys
A - The agent type
X - The result type of the agent process method
Parameters:
batch - The K/Agent map to execute
bmap - The map containing the keys
Returns:
A Map with the agent result for each key

callReduceAgentAll

public <K,A extends com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.datagrid.ReduceGridAgent,X> X callReduceAgentAll(java.util.Map<K,A> batch,
                                                                                                  com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.BackingMap bmap)
This invokes the ReduceAgent for each key as efficiently as possible and reduces the results.

Type Parameters:
K - The key type
A - The agent type
X - The result of the ReduceGridAgent
Parameters:
batch - The key/agent map
bmap - The map containing the keys
Returns:
The reduced value for all agents

startCatalogServer

public static void startCatalogServer(java.lang.String cep,

startTestServer

public static com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGrid startTestServer(java.lang.String gridName,
                                                                      java.lang.String og_xml_path,
                                                                      java.lang.String dep_xml_path)
This is a boiler plate method to create a 'grid' within a single JVM. Both xml files must be loadable from the class path. This will take about 20 seconds on a 2.4Ghz Core 2 Duo type processor. This makes it easy to do debugging of the server and client side code for a WXS project as it's a single JVM.

Parameters:
og_xml_path - The name of the objectgrid.xml file
dep_xml_path - The name of the deployment.xml file
Returns:
A 'client' reference to the created grid.

connectClient

public static com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGrid connectClient(java.lang.String cep,
                                                                    java.lang.String gridName,
                                                                    java.lang.String ogXMLpath)
This connects to a remote WXS grid.

Parameters:
cep - A comma seperated list of host:port pairs for the catalog service
gridName - The name of the grid thats desired.
Returns:
A client connection to the grid

public static void stopContainer()
